itunes:title: You Heard It Here First: An Advanced Screening of Upcoming Releases We've Already Read
title: You Heard It Here First: An Advanced Screening of Upcoming Releases We've Already Read
description:
In Episode 36 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee share a few books theyâ€™ve read that are coming out within next 3 months. They also share what they've been loving lately, their latest reads, shelf additions, and have book talk about Goodreads and The Storygraph

**Support us on Patreon ! We'd love for you to join our Book Talk community! We have great bonus episodes including: Books we DNFed, Books We Disagreed On, Even More Best of the Year, Backlist Book Club, Second Year Spoiler Author Chat, Mood Reader Happy Hour, an engaging private Facebook group where you can interact with other listeners, and more- all for just $5 a month!
